name.baseName: Corn starch ; Corn ; Wet process ; All sizes; NESPS2
玉米淀粉 ; 玉米 ; 湿法 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAnaerobic biological treatment + A2/O process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.46

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAnaerobic biological treatment + A2/O process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.46
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集涉及使用湿法磨制工艺生产不同等级的玉米淀粉，适用于所有规模的操作。产生的玉米淀粉被广泛用于食品生产、医药、造纸制造和生物塑料等各种行业。此外，数据包含有关针对废水和特定污染物（如化学需氧量、氨氮和有机结合氮）的尾端处理技术的信息。描述的各种处理过程（物理、厌氧生物、好氧生物和A2/O过程）旨在减轻这些环境影响，对于重视废物最小化和严格的出水质量标准的工业环境至关重要。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码13,四级代码1391文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为玉米淀粉，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management91.62
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理处理法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为91.62，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施年耗电量/(总额定功率(千瓦)×年运行时间(小时)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management91.6，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理处理法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为91.6，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施年耗电量（千瓦时）/(总额定功率（千瓦）×年运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical treatment + aerobic biological treatment①，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management91.04
